mapper.select: select sys_dict_type.id as dict_type_id, sys_dict_type.label, sys_dict_type.name, sys_dict_type.enabled, sys_dict_type.remark, sys_dict_type.create_by, sys_dict_type.create_time, sys_dict_type.last_update_by, sys_dict_type.last_update_time from sys_dict_type where sys_dict_type.deleted = 0
